package.name: jsx3.lang
package.text:
Base classes and the GI introspection framework.
Note that all classes in this package are also accessible under the jsx3 namespace.

nested.name: jsx3.lang.Method
nested.text: JSX Class extends the build in JavaScript class Function.

nested.name: jsx3.lang.Class
nested.text: JavaScript class that allows introspection of the JSX class hierarchy.

nested.name: jsx3.lang.ClassLoader
nested.text: The class loader initializes the system and loads applications and add-ins.

nested.name: jsx3.lang.NativeError
nested.text: Wraps the browser-native exception object (what might be caught in a typical try/catch/finally block).

nested.name: jsx3.lang.System
nested.text: A collection of GI system related functions.

nested.name: jsx3.lang.Object
nested.text: Base class for all classes defined with jsx3.lang.Class.

nested.name: jsx3.lang.Package
nested.text: The Package class provides an introspectable API for JavaScript/JSX packages.

nested.name: jsx3.lang.AOP
nested.text: Simple aspect oriented programming for General Interface.

nested.name: jsx3.lang.IllegalArgumentException
nested.text: A special exception type to throw when the caller of a function does not pass arguments according to the method's contract.
